events.message: I recently received my order but I want to return the item because it doesn't fit and request a refund for the purchase.
The issue is categorized as a refund request based on customer's desire to return the item and get money back.
Support agent Alice Johnson has been assigned to handle this refund case following the customer's request.
Hello, I am Alice from support. I understand you'd like to return your item and receive a refund. I am here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the product is unused and in original packaging for the return?
My order number is 123456789. The item is unopened and still in the original packaging as it arrived.
Thanks for the information. We have approved your return. Please send the item back within 14 days using the prepaid return label we will email you.
Thank you for the quick response and assistance. I'll send the item back as soon as I receive the label.
We have received the returned item and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been successfully processed and there are no further issues, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support.
